MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK4 postcode area of Bonnybridge, affecting properties in Bankhead Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:19pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:28pm on 29th March 2021.
